name: [P]arty Game
description:
For each letter and prompt, come up with a word that starts with that letter and follows the prompt! That's how you get a point!

If no one can think of a word, switch out either the letter or prompt!

The person with the most points by the end of the game wins! You decide when the game ends (ie. "first to 5 points wins" or "best out of 11").
